# Thanks for your contribution

Before submitting this PR, please make sure:

- [ ] The server starts without errors: `node server.js --config server-config.json`
- [ ] No lint errors: `npm run lint`
- [ ] Code is formatted: `npm run format`
- [ ] Demo works end-to-end: `npm run demo`
- [ ] Documentation is updated if you changed behavior or added options
- [ ] The commit message is in present tense and describes what the change does
